meanings.sent1: The vending machine dispenses snacks when you insert coins.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist dispenses medication to patients with prescriptions.
meanings.sent3: The magical fountain dispenses endless amounts of glitter to anyone who makes a wish.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness dispenses comfort to those in need like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The generous host dispenses hospitality to all guests with a smile.

meanings.sent1: The nurse dispenses the flu shot to protect against illness.
meanings.sent2: The doctor dispenses antibiotics to fight off the infection.
meanings.sent3: The robot doctor dispenses robot medicine to fix robot ailments.
meanings.sent4: His words dispense hope to the patients like a healing balm.
meanings.sent5: The superhero dispenses justice to the villains with a swift punch.

meanings.sent1: The charity dispenses food to the homeless every week.
meanings.sent2: The teacher dispenses stickers to students who complete their homework.
meanings.sent3: The clown dispenses laughter to the audience with silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: The sun dispenses warmth to the earth like a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The storyteller dispenses wisdom to the children through captivating tales.
